_sText:
This small army outpost is under attack from local terrorist forces.
They are at the front gate and making their way over the fence 
under the cover of night.

-------------------------------------------------------------------

Ct's must neutralise the threat and protect any potential bomb targets.

-------------------------------------------------------------------

T's must storm the base and plant the bomb at one of the two 
targets, the Operations room or the Storage room containing toxic
materials.

-------------------------------------------------------------------

As well as buy zones weapons can be found on this map for
both teams, although ct's have an armoury at their disposal.

Any ct's that spawn in a Guard Tower will automatically be armed with
an M4.

NVG's are very useful on this map.

Updates: Added a minimap, fixed some of the textures not showing up online, and a few other minor things. :)
